statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'Smith%';
SELECT first_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (3, 6, 9);
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address = '123 Main St';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%1234%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%' AND customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_amount FROM orders WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 10 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY order_date ASC, order_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone, order_date, order_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING order_count > 2 ORDER BY order_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, created_at FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date, description FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Call';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT total_amount, order_date, status FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, description FROM Interactions WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC, phone DESC;
SELECT name, email, address FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT c.name AS customer_name, o.order_id, o.total_amount FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id;
SELECT i.interaction_date AS interaction_time, i.interaction_type, c.name AS customer_name FROM interactions i JOIN customers c ON i.customer_id = c.id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customers.customer_name, orders.total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 AND campaign_type = 'Online';
